casebody.data:
WILLIAM A. FORCE & CO., Inc., v. BATES MACH. CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 14, 1909.) No. 100. Appeal from the- Circuit Court of the United States for the Eastern District of New York. For opinions below, see 169 Fed. 647; 170 Fed. 446.

Before LA COMBE, COXE, and WARD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed, without costs, by consent.
